remarks: If there is an element of the set of subsets with two elements in a set, an unordered pair of sets is in the set.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Jul-2018.)
statement:
exprelprel $p |- ( E. p e. { e e. ~P V | ( # ` e ) = 2 } p e. X -> E. v e. V E. w e. V { v , w } e. X ) $.
$d V e p v w $.
$d X p v w $.
